#include<iostream>

#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{ int n,t;
cin>>n;
while(n--)
{cin>>t;
  int f=1,x=2;
  if(t==1)
  {
      cout<<"BOB"<<endl;
      continue;
  }
  while(x!=t/2)
{ if(t%x==0)
   { f=f*-1;
    }
   x=t/x;;
}
if(f==-1)
cout<<"ALICE"<<endl;
else
cout<<"BOB"<<endl;
}



return 0;
}
